00008   function mail_reg($email, $title, $lname, $uname, $pword)
00009   {
00010     ini_set("SMTP", MAIL_SMTP);
00011 
00012     $subject = "Europlanet NA1 Matrix user registration";
00013 
00014     $headers  = 'MIME-Version: 1.0' . "\r\n";
00015     $headers .= 'Content-type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1' . "\r\n";
00016     $headers = "From: " . MAIL_FROM . "\n";
00017     $headers .= 'Cc: ' . MAIL_TO . "\r\n";
00018     $headers .= "Reply-To: " . MAIL_REPLY;
00019 
00020     $from = "-f" . MAIL_FROM;
00021 
00022     $message = "Dear " . $title . " " . $lname . "," . LF . LF;
00023     $message .= "you were registered for the NA1 Matrix. ";
00024     $message .= "You may now access the server at http://europlanet-na1.oeaw.ac.at/matrix/ ";
00025     $message .= "with username " . $uname . " and the password " . $pword . LF . LF . LF;
00026     $message .= "Sincerely," . LF . LF . LF . "The team" . LF . LF;
00027 
00028     mail($email, $subject, $message, $headers, $from);
00029   }
00030

00053   {
00054     if (trim($_POST["reg_uname"]) == "")
00055       set_message("Missing user name", "warning");
00056     if (trim($_POST["reg_pwd"]) == "")
00057       set_message("Missing password", "warning");
00058     if (trim($_POST["reg_pwd"]) != trim(($_POST["reg_pwd2"])))
00059       set_message("Confirmation password mismatch", "warning");
00060     if (trim($_POST["reg_fname"]) == "")
00061       set_message("Missing first name", "warning");
00062     else if (trim($_POST["reg_lname"]) == "")
00063       set_message("Missing last name", "warning");
00064     else if (trim($_POST["reg_email"]) == "")
00065       set_message("Missing email address", "warning");
00066     else if (trim($_POST["reg_affiliation"]) == "")
00067       set_message("Missing affiliation", "warning");
00068 
00069 // Check if username already in use
00070     $query = "SELECT username FROM users_list";
00071     $result = $link->query($query);
00072     while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00073     {
00074       if (strtoupper(trim($_POST["reg_uname"])) == strtoupper($row["username"]))
00075       {
00076         set_message("This user name is already allocated!", "warning");
00077         break;
00078       }
00079     }
00080     mysqli_free_result($result);
00081 
00082 // Throw a warning and reload if needed
00083     if (isSet($_SESSION["warning"]) || isSet($_SESSION["error"]))
00084       print "<SCRIPT>document.main_form.submit()</SCRIPT>";
00085     else
00086     {
00087       $query = "INSERT INTO users_list (`id`,`username`,`passwd`," .
00088                "`title`,`fname`,`lname`,`email`,`affiliation`," .
00089                "`category`,`level`) VALUES(NULL,'" .
00090                addslashes(trim($_POST["reg_uname"])) . "','" .
00091                md5(trim($_POST["reg_pwd"])) . "','" .
00092                $_POST["reg_title"] . "','" .
00093                addslashes(trim($_POST["reg_fname"])) . "','" .
00094                addslashes(trim($_POST["reg_lname"])) . "','" .
00095                addslashes(trim($_POST["reg_email"])) . "','" .
00096                addslashes(trim($_POST["reg_affiliation"])) . "','" .
00097                $_POST["reg_category"] . "',21)";
00098 
00099       $link->query($query);
00100       if ($link->affectedRows() > 0)
00101       {
00102         print "Thank you for registering! " .
00103               "A confirmation email has been sent to the specified address. " .
00104               "If you do not receive this message, please contact " .
00105               "<A href='mailto:robert.stoeckler@oeaw.ac.at'>Robert.Stoeckler@OeAW.ac.at</A>.<P>" . LF;
00106 
00107         mail_reg($_POST["reg_email"], $_POST["reg_title"],
